DOC.HEADLINE: FIVE ARRESTED IN BOTCHED ROBBERY , HOSTAGE INCIDENT
DOC.TEXT: Several people were taken hostage in a clothing_store after a botched robbery , and one customer was wounded before all hostages went free , police said . Five people were arrested in the Friday evening incident , which unfolded only a_few blocks from the Times Square New Year ' s Eve throngs . The police_department ' s negotiating team persuaded the men to surrender about two hours after the incident began .
